name: Air Fryer Shrimp a la Bang Bang
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: This is my take on a popular dish from a restaurant chain. My version is made in an air fryer instead of being deep-fried. The end result was perfectly crispy sweet and spicy shrimp.
ingredients: 1 pound raw shrimp, peeled and deveined
2  green onions, chopped, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Set an air fryer for 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Mix mayonnaise, chili sauce, and sriracha sauce in a bowl until smooth
Reserve some bang bang sauce in a separate bowl for dipping, if desired
Place panko on a separate plate
Coat shrimp first with flour, followed by mayonnaise mixture, then panko
Place coated shrimp on a baking sheet
Place shrimp in the air fryer basket without overcrowding
Serve in lettuce wraps garnished with green onions
